text: So mop 5yrs is a bit short. If longer like 10yrs for all and 15yrs for PLH & premier types  may be can curb this to happen..just my 5cents thought.

Invited must go down..Then if u not gonna select a unit  request to officer to waive.If u never go  they will cancelled your con current application
